df-of
blocks.content: Define the function operation map. The definition is designed so that if ` R ` is a binary operation, then ` oF R ` is the analogous operation on functions which corresponds to applying ` R ` pointwise to the values of the functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-of(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cof(c0), cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-of(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ oF(c0)=(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(dom(s0)‚ãÇ dom(s1))‚Ü¶((s0 ` s2)[c0](s1 ` s2))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: df-ofr
blocks.content: Define the function relation map. The definition is designed so that if ` R ` is a binary relation, then ` oR R ` is the analogous relation on functions which is true when each element of the left function relates to the corresponding element of the right function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ofr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cofr(c0), copab(s0, s1, wral(s2, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), c0, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: ofeq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for function operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofeq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cof(c0), cof(c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cof(c0), cof(c1), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpt2eq3dva(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), cmpt(hs2, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpteq2dv(hs2, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c1, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))
  oveqd(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c0, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), c1, w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))
  simp1(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs1), universe))
  df-of(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  df-of(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(w3a(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(cv(hs1), universe)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofeq(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí oF(c0)= oF(c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(oF(c0), oF(c1), (hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs2 ‚àà(dom(hs0)‚ãÇ dom(hs1))‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c0](hs1 ` hs2)))), (hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(hs2 ‚àà(dom(hs0)‚ãÇ dom(hs1))‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c1](hs1 ` hs2)))), c0 = c1)
  mpt2eq3dva(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, (hs2 ‚àà(dom(hs0)‚ãÇ dom(hs1))‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c0](hs1 ` hs2))), (hs2 ‚àà(dom(hs0)‚ãÇ dom(hs1))‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c1](hs1 ` hs2))), c0 = c1)
  mpteq2dv(hs2, (dom(hs0)‚ãÇ dom(hs1)), ((hs0 ` hs2)[c0](hs1 ` hs2)), ((hs0 ` hs2)[c1](hs1 ` hs2)), (c0 = c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))
  oveqd((hs0 ` hs2), c0, (hs1 ` hs2), c1, (c0 = c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))
  simp1(c0 = c1, hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs1 ‚àà ùïå)
  df-of(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0)
  df-of(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs2.w((c0 = c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ùïå))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

blocks.origin:
thm ofreq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cofr(c0), cofr(c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cofr(c0), cofr(c1), copab(hs1, hs2, wral(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(hs1)), cdm(cv(hs2))), wbr(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))), copab(hs1, hs2, wral(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(hs1)), cdm(cv(hs2))), wbr(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))), wceq(c0, c1))
  opabbidv(hs1, hs2, wceq(c0, c1), wral(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(hs1)), cdm(cv(hs2))), wbr(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))), wral(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(hs1)), cdm(cv(hs2))), wbr(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))))
  ralbidv(hs0, cin(cdm(cv(hs1)), cdm(cv(hs2))), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c0, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0))))
  breq(c0, c1, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs0)))
  df-ofr(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0)
  df-ofr(hs1, hs2, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofreq(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí oR(c0)= oR(c1))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(oR(c0), oR(c1), { < hs1, hs2 > | ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(dom(hs1)‚ãÇ dom(hs2)),(hs1 ` hs0)[c0](hs2 ` hs0))}, { < hs1, hs2 > | ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(dom(hs1)‚ãÇ dom(hs2)),(hs1 ` hs0)[c1](hs2 ` hs0))}, c0 = c1)
  opabbidv(hs1, hs2, c0 = c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(dom(hs1)‚ãÇ dom(hs2)),(hs1 ` hs0)[c0](hs2 ` hs0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà(dom(hs1)‚ãÇ dom(hs2)),(hs1 ` hs0)[c1](hs2 ` hs0)))
  ralbidv(hs0, (dom(hs1)‚ãÇ dom(hs2)), c0 = c1, (hs1 ` hs0)[c0](hs2 ` hs0), (hs1 ` hs0)[c1](hs2 ` hs0))
  breq(c0, c1, (hs1 ` hs0), (hs2 ` hs0))
  df-ofr(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0)
  df-ofr(hs1, hs2, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs2.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ofexg
blocks.content: A function operation restricted to a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ofexg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(cof(c2), c0), universe))
} = {
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(cof(c2), c0), universe), wfun(cof(c2)))
  mpt2fun(hs0, hs1, cof(c2), universe, universe, cmpt(hs2, cin(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(hs1))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c2, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  df-of(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2)
  resfunexg(cof(c2), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ofexg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(oF(c2)|` c0)‚àà ùïå)
} = {
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, (oF(c2)|` c0)‚àà ùïå, Fun(oF(c2)))
  mpt2fun(hs0, hs1, oF(c2), universe, universe, (hs2 ‚àà(dom(hs0)‚ãÇ dom(hs1))‚Ü¶((hs0 ` hs2)[c2](hs1 ` hs2))))
  df-of(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2)
  resfunexg(oF(c2), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: offval
blocks.content: Value of an operation applied to two functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm offval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c9))
  -| wceq(cin(c6, c7), c3)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cof(c1), c2), cmpt(s0, c3, co(c4, c1, c5)), cmpt(s0, cin(cdm(c0), cdm(c2)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(s0)))), w0)

} = {
  syl6eqr(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cof(c4), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c2, c4, c3)), cmpt(hs0, c0, co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c4, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0)))

  simpl3(wcel(c0, c1), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0), wfn(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  mptfng(s0, c0, c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c3))

thm ofco(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, wff w0) {

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Fn]c4)

  breq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1))
  breq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3, cv(s1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  breq2(cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)
  breq2(cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3)

  imbi12d(s0 =(c0 ` hs0), s0[c1]s1, s0[c3]s1, (c0 ` hs0)[c1]s1, (c0 ` hs0)[c3]s1)
  breq1(s0, (c0 ` hs0), c1, s1)

  imbi12d(s1 =(c2 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs0)[c1]s1, (c0 ` hs0)[c3]s1, (c0 ` hs0)[c1](c2 ` hs0), (c0 ` hs0)[c3](c2 ` hs0))

blocks.name: caonncan
blocks.content: Transfer ~ nncan -shaped laws to vectors of numbers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)

thm caonncan(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cof(c1), co(c0, cof(c1), c2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, c5))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c0, cof(c1), co(c0, cof(c1), c2)), c2, cmpt(hs0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))), cmpt(hs0, c3, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c3, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), w0)

  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c3, c2, c5, w0)

  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c5, c5, w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1)))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), c5, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  oveq12d(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1))
  eqeq12d(co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1))), cv(s1), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  oveq2d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s1)), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))
  oveq2(cv(s1), cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)

  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))))

  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c5, c5, w0, (s0[c1](s0[c1]s1))= s1)
